enWisdom: Benevolence is [a means of] servitude
The human being is a slave of kindness
Kindness enslaves (or enthrals) human beings
Kindness enslaves (or enthrals) human beings
People are the followers of what they deem to be good

Wisdom: الْمَعْرُوفُ غُلٌّ لَا يَفُكُّهُ إِلَّا شُكْرٌ أَوْ مُكَافَاةٌ
enWisdom: Good turns are shackles that cannot be extricated except through gratitude or requital
Do good and you shall enthral

Wisdom: أَحْسِنْ إِلَى مَنْ شِئْتَ وَكُنْ أَمِيرَهُ
enWisdom: Show kindness to whomever you wish and you will become his master

Wisdom: أَطِلْ يَدَكَ فِي مُكَافَاةِ مَنْ أَحْسَنَ إِلَيْكَ فَإِنْ لَمْ تَقْدِرْ فَلَا أَقَلَّ مِنْ أَنْ تَشْكُرَهُ
enWisdom: Extend your hand in recompense to the one who has done good to you, and if you are unable [to do this] then the very least you should do is thank him

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَفْضَلَ الْأَمْوَالِ مَا اسْتُرِقَّ بِهِ حُرٌّ وَاسْتُحِقَّ بِهِ أَجْرٌ
enWisdom: Indeed the best wealth is that by which the freeman is enthralled and [by which] reward is earned
Through kindness, human beings are enslaved
Through righteousness the free man is owned
Through kindness, hearts are owned
Through kindness, freemen are owned
Through kindness, people are enthralled

Wisdom: عِنْدَ تَوَاتُرِ الْبِرِّ وَالْإِحْسَانِ يُتَعَبَّدُ الْحُرُّ
enWisdom: By successive acts of kindness and benevolence, the free man is enslaved

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَشْتَرِي الْعَبِيدَ بِمَالِهِ فَيُعْتِقُهُمْ كَيْفَ لَا يَشْتَرِي الْأَحْرَارَ بِإِحْسَانِهِ فَيَسْتَرِقَّهُمْ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who buys slaves with his wealth, how can he not buy the freemen with his benevolence, thereby enthralling them
In every good turn there is indebtedness
How many a human being has been enslaved by benevolence!

Wisdom: لَقَدْ أَتْعَبَكَ مَنْ أَكْرَمَكَ إِنْ كُنْتَ كَرِيماً وَلَقَدْ أَرَاحَكَ مَنْ أَهَانَكَ إِنْ كُنْتَ حَلِيماً
enWisdom: The one who has honoured you has made you uncomfortable if you are noble-minded and the one who has offended you has made you comfortable if you are forbearing

Wisdom: لَنْ يُتَعَبَّدَ الْحُرُّ حَتَّى يُزَالَ عَنْهُ الضُّرُّ
enWisdom: The free man will never become enslaved until distress is removed from him

Wisdom: لَنْ يُسْتَرَقَّ الْإِنْسَانُ حَتَّى يَغْمُرَهُ الْإِحْسَانُ
enWisdom: The human being is not enthralled until he is engulfed by favour

Wisdom: مَنْ قَضَى حَقَّ مَنْ لَا يَقْضِي حَقَّهُ فَقَدْ عَبَّدَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever fulfils the rights of one who does not fulfil his rights has enslaved him

Wisdom: مَنْ قَبِلَ مَعْرُوفاً فَقَدْ مَلَكَ مُسْدِيهِ إِلَيْهِ رِقَّهُ
enWisdom: Whoever accepts a good turn has made the one who rendered it to him his master

Wisdom: مَنْ قَبِلَ مَعْرُوفَكَ فَقَدْ بَاعَكَ عِزَّتَهُ وَمُرُوءَتِهِ
enWisdom: One who accepts your good turn has sold you his honour and magnanimity

Wisdom: مَنْ قَبِلَ مَعْرُوفَكَ فَقَدْ أَذَلَّ لَكَ جَلَالَتَهُ وَعِزَّتَهُ
enWisdom: One who accepts your good turn has humbled his prestige and honour before you
Nothing enthrals people like doing [them] favours
Nothing enthrals the honourable ones like benevolence
